attributes.action: require all police officers to be readily identifiable at all times when on duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the government is so keen on camera surveillance to identify and catch wrongdoers, the Government SHOULD prevent police officers from obscuring their faces with balaclavas; or require police officers to wear a hat or jacket displaying a clearly visible id code (as is done with police vehicles); or otherwise ensure police officers can be identified at all times when on duty, SO THAT when police officers assault harmless members of the public, they too can be readily identified and caught.
